name: RES_ASSOC_FINDINGS
description: This table contains a result's BI-RADS associated findings.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the finding record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ASSOC_FINDINGS_C_NAME
columns.description: This column contains the BI-RADS associated findings. This column contains historical data.
